channel.title: Strange error in my cache
channel.description:
Hello!
So, today i finally got my ballscape cache... i was fricking happy till i discovered there's something wrong with the cache. I simply can't make it work trough a download link (dropbox, ...) Asked 2 coders to help me out. 1st one didn't manage to found out what it was but the second did, so i told him i would pay him 15 Euro's to fix it for me. But he doesn't want to... it's ''too much work'' he says. Which i don't really believe. So right now i'm searching for someone who knows how to fix this bug and make my cache work. If it doesn't take that long we will discuss the price.
Screenshot of bug is down there
Greetings Qeruina

item.title: Strange error in my cache
item.dc:creator: @beast_xx beast xx
item.description:
@beast_xx wrote:

I used to own ballscape with babablksheep and have all of the source files and everything since it’s last real run. I’ve been contemplating messing around with it again but was pretty sure interest had died, but this thread right here is proof it hasn’t… I might do something…

Read full topic

item.title: Strange error in my cache
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Not a very descriptive error. The file format may be corrupt or it doesn’t exist where it is meant to be. Can’t tell much more from that.

item.title: Strange error in my cache

@qeruina wrote:

Hello!

So, today i finally got my ballscape cache… i was fricking happy till i discovered there’s something wrong with the cache. I simply can’t make it work trough a download link (dropbox, …) Asked 2 coders to help me out. 1st one didn’t manage to found out what it was but the second did, so i told him i would pay him 15 Euro’s to fix it for me. But he doesn’t want to… it’s ‘‘too much work’’ he says. Which i don’t really believe. So right now i’m searching for someone who knows how to fix this bug and make my cache work. If it doesn’t take that long we will discuss the price.
